title: 700 MB weekly
info: 700 MB of Internet for 7 days at the price of 75 Afghanis. To activate W512 and to deactivate UW512, send to 555.

title: 3 GB weekly
info: 3GB of Internet for 7 days at the price of 199 Afghanis. To activate W3, send UW3 to 555.

title: 7 GB weekly
info: 7 GB of Internet for 7 days at the price of 399 Afghanis. To activate W7, send UW7 to 555.
